title: Rustc 1.65.0 Sending internal compiler errors when running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-waiting-on-author
labels.description: Status: This is awaiting some action (such as code changes or more information) from the author.

body:
### Code fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` ### Meta ``` `rustc --version --verbose`: bash-5.0# rustc -vV rustc 1.65.0 (897e37553 2022-11-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120 commit-date: 2022-11-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0 LLVM version: 15.0.0 bash-5.0# uname -a Linux build10b29b96b172 4.12.14-lp151.27-default #1 SMP Fri May 10 14:13:15 UTC 2019 (862c838) x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux bash-5.0# ``` bash-5.0# cargo build error: failed to run `rustc` to learn about target-specific information Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc - --crate-name ___ --print=file-names --crate-type bin --crate-type rlib --crate-type dylib --crate-type cdylib --crate-type staticlib --crate-type proc-macro --print=sysroot --print=cfg` (exit status: 101) --- stderr thread 'main' panicked at 'failed to get current_exe: Invalid argument (os error 22)', compiler/rustc_session/src/filesearch.rs:87:23 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f8956f41d40 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h32eb3e08e874dd27 at /rustc/897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f8956f41d40 - std::panic::catch_unwind::h81636549836d2a25 at /rustc/897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120/library/std/src/panic.rs:137:14 32: 0x7f8956f23f4f - std::rt::lang_start_internal::h6ba1bb743c1e9df9 at /rustc/897e37553bba8b42751c67658967889d11ecd120/library/std/src/rt.rs:148:20 33: 0x563b74883b17 - 34: 0x7f8956c8dc87 - __libc_start_main 35: 0x563b748839fe - 36: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.65.0 (897e37553 2022-11-02) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin --crate-type rlib --crate-type dylib --crate-type cdylib --crate-type staticlib --crate-type proc-macro query stack during panic: end of query stack bash-5.0# ```
